Title: Relates to limiting licensing to only pet dealers which sell animals obtained from shelters and rescue organizations
Summary: Limits licensing to only pet dealers which sell animals obtained from shelters and rescue organizations.
LawCode: Amd ยง403, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to limiting licensing to only pet dealers which sell animals obtained from shelters and rescue organizations
